column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////I picked this based on my sister's suggestion.  She raved about their pancakes and I wasn't disappointed.  I had the biscuits and gravy
column2: while she had the mexican skillet with a side of the oreo & smore pancakes.  The biscuits and gravy were wonderful.  The homemade biscuits were wonderful.  We split the pancakes
column3: which were more like dessert than breakfast.  The Intelligentsia coffee was excellent and reasonably priced as well.
